tagline: External systems for executive functions that don't come free — because 'try harder' isn't a strategy
pros: Lived ADHD experience plus coaching training creates deep understanding
Builds rotating strategy libraries that survive novelty fade
Concrete, specific interventions — never vague advice
Addresses emotional layer alongside executive function
cons: Not a therapist — can't treat clinical conditions
ADHD-specific — may not be the right fit for neurotypical productivity issues

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
